HandEndTransport - Class in com.pokerface.pokerapi.game
HandEndTransport is the object the sends when a hand ends and people have won money

HandEndTransport(int[], List<Player>) - Constructor for class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.HandEndTransport

HandEndTransport.PlayerTransport - Class in com.pokerface.pokerapi.game
A HandEndTransport.PlayerTransport represents the cards of a player.
handEvaluation() - Method in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.AIService
Provides the ability to consider how good a hand is.
handleAction(long, GameAction, int) - Method in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.GameController
handleAction is what takes a received action and breaks it down to send to gameService.
handleAction(long, GameAction, int) - Method in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.GameService
This method takes the message from the Controller when an action is received, it takes that action, interprets it, gets the gamestate and calls appropriate methods.
handleRound(long) - Method in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.GameService
handleRound ensures the round is advanced
handRanking - Variable in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.AIService
 
HandRanking - Class in com.pokerface.pokerapi.game
HandRanking is used to evaluate hands by the GameService at a hands end to see who won, this ranking is then used by the pot to evaluate who gets what winnings.
HandRanking(List<Card>) - Constructor for class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.HandRanking
Create a HandRanking from a list of cards.
HandRanking.Type - Enum in com.pokerface.pokerapi.game
Type is all of the types of hands in a game of poker

hasFolded - Variable in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.Player
 
hashCode() - Method in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.users.UserTransport

highCardNotRank(List<Card>, Card.Rank...) - Method in class com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.HandRanking
highCardNotRank takes in a sorted list of cards, and returns the highest card within that list that does not have the same rank as another card in the not list.
